entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Kejimkujik (National Park)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:54 PM AST Wednesday 04 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 4.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Kejimkujik Park 7:00 PM AST Wednesday 04 January 2023
Temperature: 4.1°C
Humidity: 96 %
Dewpoint: 3.6°C
Wind: NNW 4 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning before morning. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 after midnight. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Wednesday 04 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of ice pellets or snow. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow in the morning. Periods of ice pellets beginning in the afternoon. Risk of freezing rain in the afternoon. Snow and ice pellet amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 1. Wind chill near minus 9. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Wednesday 04 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of ice pellets or snow. Temperature steady near minus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of ice pellets changing to snow overnight. Snow and ice pellet amount 2 cm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature steady near minus 1. Wind chill near minus 7. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Wednesday 04 January 2023
